Transcription for 996991

I'm the owner of the great Yehomah,
Filled well through this barren land.
I am free because thou art mighty,
Holy is thy powerful hand.
Strong deliver, strong deliver,
Behold still my strength and shield.
Behold still my strength and shield.
Our rules are the rules of the world,
We bear the will of thy strength.
